definition: home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]
owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy

sentences.english: British nationalism ebbs and flows in its intensity.
sentences.chinese: 英国国家主义的强度时高时低。

sentences.english: Nazism was not only nationalism run amok.
sentences.chinese: 纳粹不仅仅是杀气腾腾的国家主义。

sentences.english: He blasted East European critics as 'collaborators with Fascism.
sentences.chinese: 他指责东欧的评论家为“极端国家主义的同谋”。

sentences.english: They were all virulently pacifistic and anti-nationalistic.
sentences.chinese: 他们坚持极度的和平主义和反国家主义。

sentences.english: These nationalisms come in different forms.
sentences.chinese: 这些国家主义形式各异。

sentences.english: Now the main ideological idea is nationalism and anti-Americanism.
sentences.chinese: 而现在，主要的意识形态变成了国家主义和反美主义。

definition: nationalism/national self-determination/principle of nationalism, the first of Dr Sun Yat-sen's 孫中山|孙中山 Three Principles of the People 三民主義|三民主义 (at the time, meaning parity between China and the great powers)/racism

pinyin: guo2 jia1 she4 hui4 zhu3 yi4
duo1 yuan2 wen2 hua4 zhu3 yi4
